title: Hardy's chicken curry
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '4 star anise pods', '5cm cinnamon stick', '8 dried curry leaves', '4 cloves', '2 large onions, diced', '5 cloves garlic, grated', '5cm piece fresh root ginger, grated', '3 tablespoons mild or medium curry paste', '2 teaspoons turmeric', '8 green cardomom pods', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '500g boneless chicken breast, cut into chunks', '400g tin of chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 large bunches of fresh coriander, chopped']
